posts.post_content:
Was fortunate enough to pick up another one so have the following 1914 T222 Fatima Jack Lelivelt for sale.  One of the more difficult shortprints in the set.  Only 3 graded by PSA and 6 by SGC.  Asking $2000 F&F or $2070 G&S.  Price includes delivery in US. First to commit to purchase gets the card. Any questions, please let me know.  

Thanks
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]
